price: Son sordos, mudos y ciegos, y no volverán [al buen camino].
arabic: صُمُّۢ بُكۡمٌ عُمۡيٞ فَهُمۡ لَا يَرۡجِعُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: ṣummun buk'mun ʿum'yun fahum lā yarjiʿūna
